message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the offer, but I was hoping to find something within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
